page.title: 11THE ECOLOGY OF RUNCORN
page.content: Runcorn was once part of a large farming area which has,through the years been heavily affected by industrial and urban development. As a result,the ecology of the area has suffered considerably.Various measures have been taken recently to redress the ecological balance.We have looked at four aspects of Runcorn's ecology. 1.{Woodland.Windmill Hill Wood GR.SJ. { 554825 and Big Wood GR.SJ.554832. 2.{Wasteland.Stenhills GR.SJ.525825. 3.{Residential land.GR.SJ.524815 { Thorn Road and Pear Tree Avenue. 4.{Reclaimed land.Wigg Island GR.SJ. { 533833 .
